page.title: 11Barnt Green's old buildings
page.content: The local{public house}is called 'The Victoria' and it was built in l884 as a Temperance Hotel and Coffee House. Barnt Green House was built about 1600. It was cleverly enlarged about 1860 in the same half-timbered design. It is now a restaurant and provides entertainment for local people. Longmead (formerly Sandhills Farm) was built in l674 probably on the site jof an ;older house and from stone quarried from the field on the opposite side of the lane. There is a brick cottage in Blackwell Road, baeside a local entertainment spot, the Social club. This old cottage was at one time a pub called 'The Slipper'. Hewell Road is the main road through the village. The terrace houses were built in about 1895.The road remained a sandy track until 1934.
